Key Match Events: Angel Di Maria scored the decisive goal for Argentina in a 1-0 win over Ecuador
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi was not in the starting lineup for Argentina
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina's defensive acumen was enough to secure a 1-0 win over Ecuador
Lionel Scaloni's decision to leave out Messi from the start was questioned
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina were short of their best in the match
Ecuador left without a shot on target
Others: Argentina won a friendly match against Ecuador ahead of the Copa America
